subject: Re: boilerplate for testEquals, testCompareTo, testHashCode wanted
msgSnippet: ... http://www.placebosoft.com/junit-extensions.zip also read the article which this code accompanies: http://www.placebosoft.com/abstract-test.html i wrote
messageBody:
--- In junit@y..., "ccbarham" <cbarham@p...> wrote:
> Hi,
>
> Does anyone have any empirical boilerplate junit test methods that
> exercise the following commonly implemented/overridden methods of
> an arbitrary class?:
> equals method
> compareTo method (if class implements Comparable)
> hashCode method

http://www.placebosoft.com/junit-extensions.zip

also read the article which this code accompanies:

http://www.placebosoft.com/abstract-test.html

i wrote the code in the junit-extensions.zip, and am open to
suggestions for other general-contract or interface compliance tests.
one thing i've changed since that post: method checkThawedObject
in AbstractSerializabilityTestCase should accept two Serializable
instances, not Object instances.

cheers,
p
